member.name: TOUCH_HIT_TESTING_PROXIMITY_EVALUATION
member.summary: Contains the hit test score that indicates whether the object is the likely target of the touch contact area, relative to other objects that intersect the touch contact area.

member.name: TOUCH_HIT_TESTING_PROXIMITY_EVALUATION.score
member.summary: The score, compared to the other objects that intersect the touch contact area.

member.name: TOUCH_HIT_TESTING_PROXIMITY_EVALUATION.adjustedPoint
member.summary: The adjusted touch point that hits the closest object that's identified by the value of Score.
